Title: Dark at Noon
Writer: Paul Fontaine (adaptation), Raoul Ruiz (dialogue adaptation), Raoul Ruiz (screenplay)
Actors: John Hurt, Didier Bourdon, Lorraine Evanoff, David Warner
Plot: Come to the Village of the Dogs, it's easy to find. Just follow the avenue of crutches and the prosthetic legs hanging from the trees. It's where the Virgin Mary keeps appearing in the sky,...
